channel.title: The complete list of tech terms starting with the letter 'W' on Tech Terminologies
channel.description: Recent content in The complete list of tech terms starting with the letter 'W' on Tech Terminologies

item.title: What is a Webcam?
item.description: A webcam is a digital video camera that is connected to a computer or computer network, allowing it to transmit real-time video footage to a remote location.

item.title: What is WAVE (Waveform Audio File Format)?
item.description: Waveform Audio File Format, or WAVE, also known as WAV due to its file extension, is a digital audio file format that stores high-quality audio recordings with lossless quality.

item.title: What is a Web-Based Installer?
item.description: A web-based installer is a software installation package that is delivered and executed over the internet.

item.title: What is Wireless Charging?
item.description: Wireless charging is a technology that allows devices to be charged without the need for a physical connection to a charger or power outlet.

item.title: What is the Web?
item.description: The World Wide Web, commonly referred to as the “Web,” is a vast network of interconnected documents and other resources linked by hyperlinks and URLs.

item.title: What is a Wireless Adapter?
item.description: A wireless adapter is a device that connects to a computer or other device and allows it to communicate over a wireless network.
